TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestWrapper>类派生自<xref:System.Web.HttpRequestBase>类，并充当包装<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。 此类公开的功能<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类并公开<xref:System.Web.HttpRequestBase>类型。 <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestBase>类，可替换的原始实现<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>使用自定义实现，如执行单元测试在 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.HttpRequest httpRequest) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified request object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Abort() cil managed

Docs.summary: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。 任何线程可能在任何时候对其进行调用。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestWrapper.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性返回当前正在执行的页处理程序的文件路径。
当您重定向使用的请求<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequestWrapper.CurrentExecutionFilePath%2A>属性 （子页） 到返回的页的重定向的路径。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetBufferedInputStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBufferedInputStream () As Stream

Docs.summary: Gets a object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.
Docs.returns: A object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等同于<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A>只不过它还将读取的字节复制到 ASP.NET 用于填充的内部存储<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream%2A>属性。 由于保留了此信息，如 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面(.aspx 文件)这样的下游代码将成功运行。 这不同于使用 <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream%2A> 方法的情况。

Docs.exception:
The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed. Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following: - The property.
- The property.
- The property.
- The method.
To avoid this exception, call the method first. This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.

Docs.summary: Gets a object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

Docs.exception:

- The property.
- The property.
- The method.
To avoid this exception, call the method first. This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类使用输入的验证标志以确定是否执行验证，通过访问的请求集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestWrapper.ValidateInput%2A>方法设置这些标志这样，当`get`访问器<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>调用属性，将执行输入的验证。 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。
